text: Space Chickens in Space is an Australian-Mexican-British-Irish animated television series produced by Ánima Estudios in Mexico, Studio Moshi in Australia, and distributed by Cake Entertainment, and was co-produced by the recent Dublin-based Gingerbread Animation and Disney EMEA. The series premiered on 9Go! in Australia on September 30, 2018, on 2x2 in Russia on January 1, 2020, and had its Disney XD premiere in Europe, Middle-East and Africa on 19 November 2018. Described as a "surreal sci-fi comedy series" by the directors in an Annecy announcement video, the series was created by José C. García de Letona and Rita Street. Jordan Goucher is showrunner for the series, and it is directed and designed by Norwegian twins Tommy and Markus Vad Flaaten. Developed for TV by Alan Keane and Shane Perez. Space Chickens in Space is fully animated in-house at Studio Moshi (Australia) using their bespoke hybrid Harmony animation pipeline, incorporating a mixture of hand- drawn and rigged high quality animation. Studio Moshi provided animation direction, design (original production-ready characters and original world development), storyboard supervision & artwork, hand crafted digital animation, visual FX. ==Plot== A trio of chickens—Chuck, Starley and Finley—are taken from their home and mistakenly enrolled in an elite intergalactic former military academy. It would take all their strength, and teamwork, to survive every escapade they have. ==Characters== Chuck (Voiced by David Menkin in Season 1 and Kyle Rideout in Season 2) is a Male Tall Chicken Who is the Leader of The Chicken Siblings. He is Cool, Daring and Wacky. He can be Selfish and Stubborn When it Comes To Challenges, But he is An True Softie when it Comes To His Siblings. In Chicken Back Again, It revealed that He is Allergic to Monstonuts and In The Good, The Bad and The Clucky, It also Revealed that He Used to Be one Of the Scouts from Slurp,s Little Cowboys Scout Camp along With Finley, Ainta and Hugo. He is the youngest of the three. Finley (Voiced by Nick Mohammed) is a Male Short Chicken Who is the Brains of the Chicken Siblings. He is Smart, İnquisitive and Mostly Calm-mannered. But He Can Go Short-Tempered when No one (Especially His Brother and Sister) Describes his İdeas as Bad İdeas. İn The Good, The Bad and The Clucky, İt Revealed That He used to be One Of the Scouts From Slurp,s Little Cowboys Camp along With Chuck, Ainta and Hugo. He is the oldest of the three. Starley (Voiced by Laura Aikman in Season 1 and Matilda Gilbert in Season 2) is a Female Chicken Who is Love. ==Episodes== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Australian children's animated space adventure television series Category:Australian children's animated comic science fiction television series Category:Australian children's animated television series Category:Australian flash animated television series Category:British children's animated space adventure television series Category:British children's animated comic science fiction television series Category:British flash animated television series Category:Irish children's animated space adventure television series Category:Irish children's animated comic science fiction television series Category:Mexican children's animated space adventure television series Category:Mexican children's animated comic science fiction television series Category:English-language television shows Category:Disney XD original programming Category:9Go! original programming Category:Disney animated television series Category:Ánima Estudios television series Category:Television series by Mattel Creations Category:Television series about chickens
title: Space Chickens in Space
